subject: Git
question:
Write the code to push the new branch "feat/Color_added" to the remote repository, that follows this workflow:
  1. Creates and moves to the new branch.
  2. After updated the "text.txt" and "script.js" files in the working directory, this codes adds them to the staging area.
  3. Nex step is adding updates to the local repository, using the message "Color added".
  4. Finally, this code pushes the branch to the remote repository.
answer:
# 1
git checkout -b feat/Color_added
# 2
git add text.txt script.js
# 3
git commit -m "Color added"
# 4
git push origin feat/Color_added
